Name: Bourbon Fruit Cup (Difford's Cup No.15)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Collins glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon, orange & strawberry slices, mint sprig & borage.
Add a citrus slice and a couple of mint leaves from garnish
Review: All whiskies seem to work well in this fruit cup recipe – bourbon's richness rounds rather than heightens the drink.
History: Created in June 2017 by yours truly at the Cabinet Room, London, England. For more recipes and history see Fruit Cups and Pimm's .
Nutrition: One serving of Bourbon Fruit Cup (Difford's Cup No.15) contains 220 calories
